source.0a25c145: #### Profit in Subcatecory by Ship Mode
source.1d9c7510: ##### According to me, the strategy is quite simple. We found out those cities or states or region where we are in loss, so in the area where we are in profit apply that area strategy to the area where we are in loss. The following img showing the region where we are in loss & you'll get another info in other graphs. ![image.png](attachment:image.png)
